price: 4. Wuxuu ku sugan yahay asalka Kitaabka3 nala yaal, Kor ah, Xikmad Badan.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ فِيٓ أُمِّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَدَيۡنَا لَعَلِيٌّ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu fī ummi al-kitābi ladaynā laʿaliyyun ḥakīmun
